description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT...Avis de projet de march.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Fire Hoses and Nozzles

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the supply of fire hoses and nozzles with the following items:

## Items and Quantities:

* 48 units of Nipple, Hose (NSN: 21-5830186) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, NS
* 8 units of Nipple, Hose (NSN: 21-5830186) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, BC
* 70 units of Reducer, Hose (NSN: 21-5831007) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, NS
* 30 units of Reducer, Hose (NSN: 21-5831007) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, BC
* 80 units of Coupling, Hose, Fire Fighting (NSN: 21-5831010) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, NS
* 30 units of Coupling, Hose, Fire Fighting (NSN: 21-5831010) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, BC
* 97 units of Coupling, Hose, Fire Fighting (NSN: 21-5831011) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, NS
* 82 units of Coupling, Hose, Fire Fighting (NSN: 21-5831011) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, BC
* 44 units of Nipple, Hose (NSN: 21-5831012) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, NS
* 22 units of Nipple, Hose (NSN: 21-5831012) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, BC

## Tender Details:

* Tender Identification Number: W8482-241518/A
* Tender Reference Number: cb-5149-73805604
* Tender Title: HOSES - MULTIPLE NSNs
* Publication Date: May 3, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 16, 2023 at 14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: June 16, 2023
* Tender Status: Expired

## Requirements:

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or
